page.title: 06Recreational activities.
page.content: Our area does not in itself supply any commercial recreational features.A country parish with many grassy lanes, river and canal banks,some marked public footpaths.Fishing from canal banks at Kirk Bramwith,cycling and jogging are popular,nearest swimming baths at Askern.Cricket ground at Barnby Dun,Sports centre at Armthorpe. Gardening is popular as most houses have generous gardens.Horse riding school at Thorpe-in-Balne,a number of ponies are kept locally.Alan Thomas at Braithwaite has many old horse drawn vehicles,hires out for parades and weddings.Pleasure craft on canals.
